message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable considering the circumstances.
I appreciate your fairness, Alice, but I think we can both do better. Let's try 65/35.  This will give us both a good starting point for negotiation.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob, but your offer doesn't account for the rapid inflation affecting your share. I'm willing to be flexible, so let's try 63/37.
